title: FS: Couple of T3 Turkey Reds
author: tiger8mush

posts.post_title: FS: Couple of T3 Turkey Reds
posts.post_content:
Prices shipped w/insurance - first to email [url]tiger8mush@yahoo.com[/url] gets them.

Tenney - $325 - pinhole top center and bottom center, crease on bottom right corner, wear to bottom left corner.  Great color and eye appeal.

Thomas SGC 40 - $250 - light wear to each of the corners, 3 small spots of white to the right of his glove, very light stain at top right edge, bottom edge looks to have been pushed against SGC black insert and damage is only noticable on front, very light crease starting at bottom middle edge and goes inbetween  the words "Thomas" and "Phila.".  The picture I took shows a bunch of flash reflections that are NOT on the card, so I included the scan from the seller I got the card from.

Any questions, please ask!
Thanks,
Rob
:o)
